name: Snake Game Classic 1997
description:
Snake Game Classic 1997 is a classic implementation of the famous Snake game that used to be so popular on old mobile phones.

Snake Game Classic 1997 is an old classic, very simple, but insanely addictive game.
Now you can try this beautiful classic game.

HOW TO PLAY
- Swipe left, right, up, down to control the snake
- Your task is to eat the green squares
- The more you eat, the longer is the snake
- Don't touch the walls or your own tail, or you lose
